item.description:
This year we're going to show "Reveal The Path" Directed by Mike Dion.  He also Directed "Ride The Divide".

It looks like a great film that has won many awards!

Here's the link....http://revealthepath.com/about/

After the movie we''ll head across the street for dinner at a great Chinese Restaurant (Dinner is NOT included in the movie admission price).

Come for one or both parts of this event!

I am not able to accept payments for the movie at the door - sorry.  If you are not comfortable using PayPal, please send a check for $3.50 to Rob Fox - c/o Job Stress Solutions, 7 Winn St., 2nd Floor, Woburn, MA 01801 by the deadline of Dec. 31st).

Snacks/Beverages will be provided at the film.

 

I look forward to seeing you!!

Rob Fox

Founder/Organizer of Greater Boston Bicycle
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the event is 617-894-8454
item.name: Rob's Annual Movie Night - REI Reading and Chinese Dinner afterwards at Mandarin
